title: France panorama. [No. 72/22]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: 24-hour boatrace - the Rouen 24-hour outboard race. Europain - the international baker’s equipment salon. Singier - an exhibition of recent works. 2. Aquaculture - the study of scientific feeding and reproduction of fish. 3. The Marais - preservation and restoration of Paris’ oldest quarter. 4. The French symbolists - in Paris, the French Symbolist exhibition, soon to be leaving for Britain.
